title: Zapitrinantopik
author: Zapitrinantopik
content: You guys on CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko yet? Or looking for a listing? (Takes on average 1-3 days per listing)I do accept your coin as payment!How it works:We have connection in CMC. They can't bypass the typical listing requirements, but the service we provide is an expedited application and resubmission to get in front of a listing manager instead of  waiting in the queue like all the other tokens. When tokens apply they get sent to the back of the queue and then they're at the mercy of the normal wait time. If you are missing information or if it's denied you won't know until you've waited all that time and then you start the process again..The quickest we've listed with this connect is about 2 hours, average being 2-3 days, of course there are some outliers (depending on the performance of the token; usual "dead" tokens wait longer) CMC/CG FAST TRACKPrice: CMC $3,500 CG $2,500Both $5,000Its a jeet service it means we have %80 chance to do listing also have guarenteed CMC Listing it cost $15,000(less than 6 hours)(Middle Man accepted as long as fee covered) We can use https://t.me/saulpink or https://t.me/goodbye for MMIf you interested contact: https://t.me/Mooticohttps://t.me/MootieServices

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Zapitrinantopik on June 22, 2023, 08:23:52 PMYou guys on CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko yet? Or looking for a listing? (Takes on average 1-3 days per listing)I do accept your coin as payment!How it works:We have connection in CMC. They can't bypass the typical listing requirements, but the service we provide is an expedited application and resubmission to get in front of a listing manager instead of  waiting in the queue like all the other tokens. When tokens apply they get sent to the back of the queue and then they're at the mercy of the normal wait time. If you are missing information or if it's denied you won't know until you've waited all that time and then you start the process again..The quickest we've listed with this connect is about 2 hours, average being 2-3 days, of course there are some outliers (depending on the performance of the token; usual "dead" tokens wait longer) CMC/CG FAST TRACKPrice: CMC $3,500 CG $2,500Both $5,000Its a jeet service it means we have %80 chance to do listing also have guarenteed CMC Listing it cost $15,000(less than 6 hours)(Middle Man accepted as long as fee covered) We can use https://t.me/saulpink or https://t.me/goodbye for MMIf you interested contact: https://t.me/Mooticohttps://t.me/MootieServices You're asking a lot of money for this service but providing no proof that you can or will provide what's promised. Also, you're telling people that you will agree to escrow, but only offering to use escrows noone has heard of. If someone was interested in your service, I would suggest they only use escrows from this forum. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5047302.0 here is a list.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Coingecko has a strong warning for people who are offering to expedite listing on their platform QuoteAnyone claiming that they can list a coin or expedite the listing process on CoinGecko is a scammer.You are asking for a huge fee without showing us anything, for us asking money without showing proof of their work is considered attempted scamming, I don't know how are you going to address this when Coingecko issued a strong warning and they have not changed their policy until now.https://support.coingecko.com/hc/en-us/articles/7291312302617-How-to-list-new-cryptocurrencies-on-CoinGecko-

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on June 22, 2023, 10:48:15 PMCoingecko has a strong warning for people who are offering to expedite listing on their platform QuoteAnyone claiming that they can list a coin or expedite the listing process on CoinGecko is a scammer.You are asking for a huge fee without showing us anything, for us asking money without showing proof of their work is considered attempted scamming, I don't know how are you going to address this when Coingecko issued a strong warning and they have not changed their policy until now.[snip]https://support.coingecko.com/hc/en-us/articles/7291312302617-How-to-list-new-cryptocurrencies-on-CoinGecko-In addition to that, there's also no listing fee for CoinMarketCap. Any project development team that pays for such service just to get listed on Cmc or CoinGecko don't even worth having a project in the crypto market.

comments.author: Zapitrinantopik
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on June 22, 2023, 10:48:15 PMCoingecko has a strong warning for people who are offering to expedite listing on their platform QuoteAnyone claiming that they can list a coin or expedite the listing process on CoinGecko is a scammer.You are asking for a huge fee without showing us anything, for us asking money without showing proof of their work is considered attempted scamming, I don't know how are you going to address this when Coingecko issued a strong warning and they have not changed their policy until now.https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/06/22/HDDfc.md.pnghttps://support.coingecko.com/hc/en-us/articles/7291312302617-How-to-list-new-cryptocurrencies-on-CoinGecko-Listing on CMC & CG is 100% free. It’s the truth. However, we’re here to help assist with the application because applying requires more than just saying statements. You have to be professional and cohesive in your application. Hence why we help and provide our services. It helps your application have a higher chance at succeeding.We will vet your project and collect some information from you to ensure that you are in the best possible position for a successful listing.We can even offer to fast track your application too. We cannot gurantee a 100% successful listing but our success ratio sure is very high.

comments.author: GH2022
comments.body: This sounds about as real as those Bitcoin Generators on TOR... i.e. not at all.I'm sceptical, but if you can post a video showing this is legit then I guess most people will say 'ah okay, no worries.'
